panels.description:
On which VLA pad the specified antenna sits.
Polled every 60s.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ant_pad")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "${Antenna}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Antenna Pad location

panels.description:
Mapping of Antenna name to <server>:<pcie_id>_<pipeline_id>
Updated every 60s
panels.title: Antenna to Fengine device map

panels.description: Displacement of all antenna from array centre in metres
panels.title: Displacement of Antenna from array centre

panels.description:
The dts ok field for all antenna.
Computed from:
feng.dts.get_status_dict()['ok']
Polled every 60s

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dts_state_ok")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "ea01" or r["ant"] == "ea02" or r["ant"] == "ea03" or r["ant"] == "ea04" or r["ant"] == "ea05" or r["ant"] == "ea06" or r["ant"] == "ea07" or r["ant"] == "ea08" or r["ant"] == "ea09" or r["ant"] == "ea10" or r["ant"] == "ea11" or r["ant"] == "ea12" or r["ant"] == "ea13" or r["ant"] == "ea14" or r["ant"] == "ea15" or r["ant"] == "ea17" or r["ant"] == "ea16" or r["ant"] == "ea18" or r["ant"] == "ea19" or r["ant"] == "ea20" or r["ant"] == "ea21" or r["ant"] == "ea22" or r["ant"] == "ea23" or r["ant"] == "ea24" or r["ant"] == "ea25" or r["ant"] == "ea26" or r["ant"] == "ea27" or r["ant"] == "ea28")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: All antenna dts ok

panels.description:
The reported sync state of DTS signals. Will report OK if all 12 lanes of a DTS link appear to be locked together.
As returned by:
feng.dts.get_status_dict()['state_ok']['sync_ok'].
Polled every 60s.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dts_state_sync_ok")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "ea01" or r["ant"] == "ea02" or r["ant"] == "ea03" or r["ant"] == "ea04" or r["ant"] == "ea05" or r["ant"] == "ea06" or r["ant"] == "ea07" or r["ant"] == "ea08" or r["ant"] == "ea09" or r["ant"] == "ea10" or r["ant"] == "ea11" or r["ant"] == "ea12" or r["ant"] == "ea13" or r["ant"] == "ea14" or r["ant"] == "ea15" or r["ant"] == "ea17" or r["ant"] == "ea16" or r["ant"] == "ea18" or r["ant"] == "ea19" or r["ant"] == "ea20" or r["ant"] == "ea21" or r["ant"] == "ea22" or r["ant"] == "ea23" or r["ant"] == "ea24" or r["ant"] == "ea25" or r["ant"] == "ea26" or r["ant"] == "ea27" or r["ant"] == "ea28")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: All antenna dts state sync ok

panels.description:
The reported state of the DTS lock, which indicates correct recovery of the sync pattern embedded in DTS data streams.
As returned by:
feng.dts.get_status_dict()['state_ok']['lock_ok'].
Polled every 60s.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dts_state_lock_ok")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "ea01" or r["ant"] == "ea02" or r["ant"] == "ea03" or r["ant"] == "ea04" or r["ant"] == "ea05" or r["ant"] == "ea06" or r["ant"] == "ea07" or r["ant"] == "ea08" or r["ant"] == "ea09" or r["ant"] == "ea10" or r["ant"] == "ea11" or r["ant"] == "ea12" or r["ant"] == "ea13" or r["ant"] == "ea14" or r["ant"] == "ea15" or r["ant"] == "ea17" or r["ant"] == "ea16" or r["ant"] == "ea18" or r["ant"] == "ea19" or r["ant"] == "ea20" or r["ant"] == "ea21" or r["ant"] == "ea22" or r["ant"] == "ea23" or r["ant"] == "ea24" or r["ant"] == "ea25" or r["ant"] == "ea26" or r["ant"] == "ea27" or r["ant"] == "ea28")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: All antenna DTS state lock ok

panels.description:
Reported lock state of FPGA "GTY" transceivers, as returned by:
feng.dts.get_status_dict()['state_ok']['gty_lock_ok'].
Polled every 60s.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dts_state_gty_lock_ok")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "ea01" or r["ant"] == "ea02" or r["ant"] == "ea03" or r["ant"] == "ea04" or r["ant"] == "ea05" or r["ant"] == "ea06" or r["ant"] == "ea07" or r["ant"] == "ea08" or r["ant"] == "ea09" or r["ant"] == "ea10" or r["ant"] == "ea11" or r["ant"] == "ea12" or r["ant"] == "ea13" or r["ant"] == "ea14" or r["ant"] == "ea15" or r["ant"] == "ea17" or r["ant"] == "ea16" or r["ant"] == "ea18" or r["ant"] == "ea19" or r["ant"] == "ea20" or r["ant"] == "ea21" or r["ant"] == "ea22" or r["ant"] == "ea23" or r["ant"] == "ea24" or r["ant"] == "ea25" or r["ant"] == "ea26" or r["ant"] == "ea27" or r["ant"] == "ea28")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: All antenna DTS FPGA Transceiver Lock

panels.description: Number of detected parity errors since last DTS reset,  all DTS lanes and antenna

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "acc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "ea01" or r["ant"] == "ea02" or r["ant"] == "ea03" or r["ant"] == "ea04" or r["ant"] == "ea05" or r["ant"] == "ea07" or r["ant"] == "ea06" or r["ant"] == "ea08" or r["ant"] == "ea10" or r["ant"] == "ea09" or r["ant"] == "ea11" or r["ant"] == "ea13" or r["ant"] == "ea12" or r["ant"] == "ea14" or r["ant"] == "ea15" or r["ant"] == "ea16" or r["ant"] == "ea17" or r["ant"] == "ea18" or r["ant"] == "ea19" or r["ant"] == "ea20" or r["ant"] == "ea21" or r["ant"] == "ea22" or r["ant"] == "ea23" or r["ant"] == "ea24" or r["ant"] == "ea25" or r["ant"] == "ea26" or r["ant"] == "ea28" or r["ant"] == "ea27")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dts_lane"] == "0" or r["dts_lane"] == "1" or r["dts_lane"] == "10" or r["dts_lane"] == "11" or r["dts_lane"] == "2" or r["dts_lane"] == "3" or r["dts_lane"] == "4" or r["dts_lane"] == "5" or r["dts_lane"] == "6" or r["dts_lane"] == "7" or r["dts_lane"] == "8" or r["dts_lane"] == "9")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: All antenna DTS Accumulated Parity Errors

panels.description: Number of detected parity errors per second for each DTS lane and each antenna

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "ea01" or r["ant"] == "ea02" or r["ant"] == "ea03" or r["ant"] == "ea04" or r["ant"] == "ea05" or r["ant"] == "ea07" or r["ant"] == "ea06" or r["ant"] == "ea08" or r["ant"] == "ea10" or r["ant"] == "ea09" or r["ant"] == "ea11" or r["ant"] == "ea13" or r["ant"] == "ea12" or r["ant"] == "ea14" or r["ant"] == "ea15" or r["ant"] == "ea16" or r["ant"] == "ea17" or r["ant"] == "ea18" or r["ant"] == "ea19" or r["ant"] == "ea20" or r["ant"] == "ea21" or r["ant"] == "ea22" or r["ant"] == "ea23" or r["ant"] == "ea24" or r["ant"] == "ea25" or r["ant"] == "ea26" or r["ant"] == "ea28" or r["ant"] == "ea27")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dts_lane"] == "0" or r["dts_lane"] == "1" or r["dts_lane"] == "10" or r["dts_lane"] == "11" or r["dts_lane"] == "2" or r["dts_lane"] == "3" or r["dts_lane"] == "4" or r["dts_lane"] == "5" or r["dts_lane"] == "6" or r["dts_lane"] == "7" or r["dts_lane"] == "8" or r["dts_lane"] == "9")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: All antenna DTS Parity Errors per second

panels.description: Since a single equalisation coefficient is applied across all channels on the F-Engine every configuration, the mean plotted here is equal to the equalisation coefficient (compare with the eq identical panel to verify).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "eq_mean_coeff")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "${Antenna}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stream"] == "0" or r["stream"] == "1" or r["stream"] == "2" or r["stream"] == "3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Equalisation coefficient mean across frequency

panels.description: As we apply a single equalisation coefficient to the whole band, this panel checks that the coefficients are equal for all frequency channels.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "eq_identical_coeffs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "ea01")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Equalisation coefficient identical across the band

panels.description: Fetched from the cosmic_fengine.input block, this graph depicts the mean input value taken.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inpt_mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "${Antenna}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stream"] == "0" or r["stream"] == "1" or r["stream"] == "2" or r["stream"] == "3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inpt_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ant"] == "${Antenna}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stream"] == "0" or r["stream"] == "1" or r["stream"] == "2" or r["stream"] == "3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "fengine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "feng_stat")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stream"] == "0" or r["stream"] == "1" or r["stream"] == "2" or r["stream"] == "3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.name: Antenna
